name: Fast Racing: Top Speed
description:
Experience real car driving physics and drifting mechanics, feel like a street racer! Start your engine, street racer! The most powerful cars and most experienced racers fight in countless racing events for the title of top driver. Huge open world living its daily life until your car touches the road. Realistic car driving simulator will make you feel adrenaline, smell burning tires of drifting cars and listen for high pitch engine sound


Features:
• Choose from 30+ of the fastest cars in the world!
• Test thousands of tuning and customization options!
• Play different racing game modes
• Explore 3 different maps: airport, highway, and docks!
• Explore outstanding 3D HD visuals!
• Choose from over 100 different car decals!

Show everyone your super driving skills and amazing cars! Send car to drift and make shots of the most crazy moments. Download and play now


--------
Disclaim:
This app allows you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.

Subscription Terms:
VIP Pass offers a weekly subscription for $6.49 or equivalent in your local currency after a 3-day free trial.
After purchasing this subscription, you will immediately unlock 3 exclusive VIP cars, distance bonus, daily cash and remove all non-rewarded ads. This is an Auto-renewable subscription. The payment is charged to your iTunes account after confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal as well. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.


You can turn off the auto-renew for the subscription whenever you want in the settings if your iTunes account. Check https://support.apple.com/HT202039.

Privacy Policy: https://fastracingtop.blogspot.com/2023/02/privacy-policy.html
